title: legacy client not launching
body: every time i click the option to launch the legacy client it just closes out the client and doesn't reopen i have to keep launching league and try to do it again but it doesn't work it just keep doing the same thing.

replies.body: I'm having the same problem.  Tried launching lol.launcher, lol.launcher.admin, adjusting the user.cfg file and restarting my machine.
